description:
For active families, a floor pump is a must. Outfitted with a large digital display, this floor pump makes it easy to get your tires ready to roll. Pumping up to 180 PSI, this pump can handle low pressure mountain bike tires, high pressure road bike tires, and everything in between.

  • Universal pump-head fits Schrader and presta valves
  • Digital display is easy to read in any light and can show PSI or BAR
  • Display is accurate to 0.5 PSI
  • Ergonomic polymer handle
  • Long hose means less repositioning of the pump and less spinning wheels to get to the valve
  • Broad base with non-slip pads keeps the pump anchored in place while in use
name: MEC Digital Floor Pump
